comment: This is a composite key, along with scope
description: The key field
title: Key

comment: This is a composite key, along with key
description: The scope field
title: Scope

comment: The sort order counts from 0, if two are equal in a set, then secondary sort is by key (alpha)
description: The ordinal field determines sort order
title: Ordinal

comment: The title of this field
description: The title is the label that is displayed to the end user
title: Title

description: The description is used in tooltips and other queues to the user
title: Description

comment: comment on the comment!
description: The comment is additional information displayed in the detail view
title: Comment

comment: data type for persistence/serialization
description: Data Type
title: Data Type

comment: display type for list and detail view
description: Display Type
title: Display Type

comment: display options as json; used by client to display
description: Options hash for the client to parse on display.
title: Display Options

comment: edit view type
description: Edit Type
title: Edit Type

description: The designations of where this field is visible
title: Visibility

description: Field can be edited in these contexts
title: Editability

description: The designations of whether this field is orderable through the API
title: Orderable

description: Specifies that this field may be filtered through the API interface
title: Filterable

comment: This field both specifies (if set) that this is a json field, and also the type of that field, for use by tastypie in serialization with the client
description: The json_field_type, if set, specifies that this field is stored virtually in the json_field of the metahash
title: API (JSON) Field Type

comment: This scope field value in the vocabularies table for the vocabulary entries for this field
description: The vocabulary_scope_ref is used to look up controlled vocabularies for this field in the vocabularies table
title: Vocabulary:scope

description: Internal use only ID
title: ID

description: Internal use only resource_uri
title: URI

description: Unused
title: Alias

comment: default
description: Default value for new instances
title: Default

comment: Field permissions follow the resource permissions, unless the field is restricted, in which case explicit permissions must be given for this field.
description: Whether this field requires explicit permissions to view, edit, or create
title: Is Restricted

description: The resource ID for the nested resource
title: Nested Resource

description: Does this field require a value?
title: Required

description: Regex format that this field must comply to
title: Format

description: Minimum allowed value
title: Min

description: Maximum allowed value
title: Max

comment: This field supports tokens (references to other fields)
description: Validation failure message
title: Validation message

comment: The type of the field, for use by tastypie in serialization with the client
description: The linked_field_type, if set, specifies that this field is stored virtually in a field in the linked_field_module table
title: Linked Field Type

comment: Use the full Python style path, i.e. <module.module.Class>
description: The table model module used to hold the linked field
title: Linked Field Table Module

comment: This field both specifies (if set) that this is a linked field, and it specifies the field name in the linked field module that holds the value
description: This field both specifies (if set) that this is a linked field, and it specifies the field name in the linked field module that holds the value
title: Linked Field Value Field

comment: This field is the foreign key back to the parent table
description: The name of the field linking back to the parent table/resource
title: Linked Field Parent Field

comment: This field is the foreign key back to the column (meta) definition.  Omit this field one-to-one cases (complex linked table, single value linked table)
description: The name of the field linking back to the owning column (metadata)
title: Linked Field Meta Field

comment: A string with '{attribute_name}' patterns embedded, that will be replaced with model attributes and used as the displayed string for this field.
description: A string with '{attribute_name}' patterns embedded, that will be replaced with model attributes and used as the displayed string for this field.
title: Display Format

comment: If set, this field overrides the linked_field_module _meta.db_table on read
description: The name of the database table this field lives on (if any).
title: Database Table

comment: If set, this field overrides the linked_field_value_field on read
description: The name of the database table field for this field (if needed, if any).
title: Database Field

comment: If set for a linked_field_type=fields.ListField, then this is the secondary field with which to order by
description: Field to order by
title: Order By Field

comment: A descriptor of 'text and {fieldname}' use to generate the value for this field.
description: A descriptor of 'text and {fieldname}' use to generate the value for this field.
title: Value Template

comment: Other fields that this field depends on (in the UI)
description: Other fields that this field depends on (in the UI)
title: Dependency fields
